titles.ar: بَابُ صَوْمِ الْوِصَالِ وَ صَوْمِ الدَّهْرِ
titles.en: Chapter 16 – The continuous Fasting, and Fasting the whole time

titles.ar: بَابُ صَوْمِ الْوِصَالِ وَ صَوْمِ الدَّهْرِ
titles.en: Chapter 16 – The continuous Fasting, and Fasting the whole time

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ سَيْفِ بْنِ عَمِيرَةَ عَنْ حَسَّانَ بْنِ مُخْتَارٍ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) مَا الْوِصَالُ فِي الصِّيَامِ قَالَ فَقَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) قَالَ لَا وِصَالَ فِي صِيَامٍ وَ لَا صَمْتَ يَوْمٍ إِلَى اللَّيْلِ وَ لَا عِتْقَ قَبْلَ مِلْكٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Sayf Bin Ameyra, from Hassan Bin Mukhtar who said, 
‘I said to Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup>, ‘What is the continuation regarding the Fasting?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘There is neither a continuation (without breaking Fast) regarding the Fasting, nor a silence for the day up to the night, nor an emancipation before ownership’.

verses.text: أَحْمَدُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ الْوِصَالُ فِي الصِّيَامِ أَنْ يَجْعَلَ عَشَاءَهُ سَحُورَهُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Al Hassan Bin Mahboub, from Al Halby, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said; ‘The continuation regarding the Fasting is that he makes his dinner as his pre-dawn meal’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ وَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَفْصِ بْنِ الْبَخْتَرِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ الْمُوَاصِلُ فِي الصِّيَامِ يَصُومُ يَوْماً وَ لَيْلَةً وَ يُفْطِرُ فِي السَّحَرِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, and Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fal Bin Shazan, altogether from Ibn Abu Umery, from Hafs Bin Al Bakhtary, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The continuous regarding the Fasting is that one Fasts a day and a night, and breaks Fast in the pre-dawn meal’.

verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ الْوَشَّاءِ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ صَوْمِ الدَّهْرِ فَقَالَ لَمْ نَزَلْ نَكْرَهُهُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Al Washa, from Aban, from Zurara who said, 
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about Fasting the whole time, so he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘It is not Revealed. We<sup>asws</sup> dislike it’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ قَالَ سَأَلْتُهُ عَنْ صَوْمِ الدَّهْرِ فَكَرِهَهُ وَ قَالَ لَا بَأْسَ أَنْ يَصُومَ يَوْماً وَ يُفْطِرَ يَوْماً .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Usman Bin Isa, from Sama’at who said, 
‘I asked him<sup>asws</sup> about Fasting the whole time, so he<sup>asws</sup> disliked it and said: ‘There is no problem if one were to Fast for one day, and break (not Fast) for one day’.
